title: Vows
text:
To honor and cherish you
To respect you as I respect myself
To be honest and open my heart to you without reservation
To fight well and forgive wholeheartedly
To support your journey of growth wherever it may lead us
To be responsible for my own happiness even as we care for each other
To put you first and remember the little things matter
To love you even when we hate each other
To ride the waves together and grow in love
